簱字的基本解释

簱
同“籏”，日本地名用字。

簱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《廣韻》渠之切，平之，羣。］
亦作“簱1”。亦作“籏1”。
(1)古代画有熊虎图象的旗。
(2)亦作“旂”。泛指各种旗帜。
(3)犹表明；标志。
(4)犹号令。
(5)指茶芽始展的小叶。
(6)星名。
(7)清代以旗帜的名色作为区别的兵民一体的组织。
(8)清代农民军的编制单位。
(9)内蒙古自治区的行政区划单位，相当于县。
(10)通“箕”。二十八宿之一。
(11)姓。汉有九江太守旗光。见《广韵·平之》。

簱字的康熙字典解释
簱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
簱字的起名意思

暂无。

簱
Basic explanation of words
簱
Same as "籏", Japanese place names use characters.
簱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Guangyun" Qu Zhiqi, Ping Zhi, Qun. ]
Also known as "簱1". Also known as "籏1".
(1) Ancient flags with images of bears and tigers.
(2) Also used as a "flag". Refers to various flags in general.
(3) Still show; sign.
(4) Still giving orders.
(5) Refers to the small leaves where the tea buds begin to unfold.
(6) Star name.
(7) The Qing Dynasty used the name and color of the banner as a united organization of soldiers and civilians.
(8) The establishment unit of the Peasant Army in the Qing Dynasty.
(9) The administrative division unit of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region is equivalent to a county.
(10) Through "kei". One of twenty-eight nights.
(11) Last name. Han had the flag of Jiujiang prefect. See "Guangyun·Pingzhi".
簱
